title: Designing Tiered Web-Based Language Instruction for Diverse Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and beginner-level language learning experience
context.additional_context: Customized language education for professionals (medical/legal/technical) combining web-based materials and offline activities in a blended learning approach within a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately utilize 50 essential language expressions by specialized field within 4 weeks
Learners can self-directively select tiered content (basic/intermediate/advanced) in web-based learning tools
Learners can revise and supplement personalized learning plans based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
